oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rick Riman tapes - tape 5 of 5 - Side one channel two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: As listed on insert: Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys radio and TV dubs. WTVK 1964-01-14 / 1964-01-28 / WEAR 1964-01-29 with Jim McReynolds (guitar); Jesse McReynolds (mandolin); Allen Shelton (banjo); Jim Brock (fiddle); Monroe Fields (bass); / Jim and Jesse at Echo Lake park, Afton, New York, 1965 (?); Same personal as previous except Ray Kirkland (bass); / Jesse McReynolds and Jim Brock (fiddles) believed to have been recorded at the University of Chicago Folk music festival in January of 1966 / Frank Wakefield and Red Allen on WDON-AM in Wheaton, Maryland in 1964 (?) with listed personnel as Frank Wakefield (mandolin); Red Allen (guitar); Pete Roberts (banjo); Tom Morgan (bass); Kenny Haddock (dobro). Audio restricted. Contact for access.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim and Jesse McReynolds; The Virginia Boys (Musical group); Red Allen; Frank Wakefield;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jim and Jesse McReynolds; WTVY 1964-01-14 / (00:27) Take My Ring From Your Finger / (02:37) Earl's Breakdown / (04:05) Ice Cold Love / (05:48) Texas Quickstep (Brock) / (07:24) Foggy Mountain Top / (09:25) Blue Bonnet Lane (01-28-64) ? / (11:26) Wildfire / (13:48) Wildwood Flower (Shelton) / (15:15) Cheyenne / WEAR 1964-01-28 (17:12) Careless Love, Goodbye / (19:04) Dear Old Dixie / (21:03) God Put A Rainbow In The Clouds / (23:35) Panhandle Country / (25:04) Sunny Mountain Chimes / (26:40) My Empty Arms / (28:50) Shackles And Chains (Monroe Fields) / (30:41) Mississippi Sawyer (Brock) / (31:29) Jim and Jesse at Echo Lake Park in Afton New York in 1965 (?) with Ray Kirkland on bass / Sweet Little Miss Blue Eyes / (33:56) Ole Slewfoot / (37:00) Alabam / (39:48) Shenandoah Valley Breakdown (Allen Shelton - banjo) / (41:19) Stormy Horizons / (44:18) Before You Go (Ray Kirkland) / (47:26) Orange Blossom Special (Jim Brock - fiddle) / (50:37) Swing Low, Sweet Chariot / (53:30) When He Reached Down His Hand For Me / (57:49) Border Ride / (59:24) I Wish You Knew / (01:02:00) Lady Of Spain (Allen Shelton - banjo) / SIGNAL BREAK / (01:04:32) She Left Me Standing On The Mountain / (01:06:38) The Girl In The Blue Velvet Band / (01:09:45) Blackberry Blossom (Jim Brock - fiddle) / (01:11:39) Drifting And Dreaming /(01:14:20) Dixie Hoedown / (01:15:55) Jesse McReynolds and Jim Brock on fiddles believed to have been recorded at the University of Chicago folk music festival in 1966 / Arkansas Traveler / (01:17:12) Dixie Hoedown / (01:18:15) Frank Wakefield and Red Allen on WDON-AM in Wheaton, Maryland 1964 (?) / My Aching Heart / (01:25:28) Faded Memory / (01:22:42) John Henry / (01:24:50) Red Wing / (01:26:43) Deep Elem Blues / (01:29:10) Swing Low, Sweet Chariot / (01:31:24) Little Maggie / (01:33:11) Shake Hands With Mother Again / (01:35:55) Handy Man / TAPE END
